name: Frust
description:
Asim, the guardian of Hope, a jellyfish-like light creature and the spirit of Umbron, gets into a situation where not even Hope can help him and sorrow takes over the world of Umbron.

"Without Hope, I'm nothing"

- Asim, protector of Umbron and guardian of Hope
